snippet: Michael R. Bloomberg hasn’t always seemed thrilled with the lighter, grin-and-bear-it ceremonies that come with being mayor. But there have been some high points.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg has endured 12 years of obligatory grin-and-bear-it ceremonies in his three terms as mayor of New York City; in his latest, mayor weighs in at Nathan's Famous International Hot Dog Eating Contest, calling it a thrilling grand finale as he prepares to leave office.
lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg hasn’t always seemed thrilled with the lighter, grin-and-bear-it ceremonies that come with being mayor. But there have been some high points.

headline.main: 3 Long Terms of Hot Dogs, Groundhogs and Corny Puns for Bloomberg
headline.print_headline: 3 Long Terms Of Hot Dogs, Groundhogs And Corny Puns
